backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing profiles, posts, comments, reactions, and permission-checked CRUD operations with image size validation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking UI username display updates and a React Query username hook to specific files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including hooks, components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with lazy‑loaded pages, routing tree, theme provider, and layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Modal gate enforcing 18+ confirmation on protected routes with profile sync and navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity auth, query cache clearing, and age‑acknowledgement reset.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Displays a single comment with reactions, reporting, author check, and error handling wrapped in a memoized component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper providing header, footer, navigation, and gating via profile and age checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Slide-in mobile navigation menu showing links and login controls based on auth state.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays an individual post with image, reactions, reporting, deletion, and navigation to comments.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Forces authenticated users without a profile to complete a setup dialog before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Reaction button bar allowing selection of emoji-style reactions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Reusable components for loading skeletons, error states, empty states, and background refresh indicators.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Full‑page loader shown while route-level code chunks are loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Converts backend image data to a blob URL and cleans it up to prevent memory leaks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user identity, auth status, and loaded profile information.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as posts, profiles, comments, and admin status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode, plus custom utility classes like hero gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Implements the main feed with post listing, auto-refresh, post creation with image upload, and related UI states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero section, community intro, and links to join or access the feed.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with its comments, supports adding new comments, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React page that loads, displays, and updates the current user's profile with form fields and admin checks.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: Utilities for storing and checking age‑gate acknowledgement and determining whether a route is age‑gated.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Image validation and conversion helpers for uploads, including backend format conversion and error extraction.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, features, and pending feature requests for showing usernames on the community feed.
